# Greater Trip (Feat)
## Overview
You can make free attacks on foes that you knock down.

**Prerequisites**: [[Combat Expertise (Feat)|Combat Expertise]], [[Improved Trip (Feat)|Improved Trip]], base attack bonus +6, Int 13.

**Benefit**: You receive a +2 bonus on checks made to trip a foe. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by [[Improved Trip (Feat)|Improved Trip]]. Whenever you successfully trip an opponent, that opponent provokes attacks of opportunity.

**Normal**: Creatures do not provoke attacks of opportunity from being tripped.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 126
